title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.10 - Requirements for primary breeding flocks (grandparent flocks) and multiplier breeding flocks (parent flocks)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.10 - Requirements for primary breeding flocks (grandparent flocks) and multiplier breeding flocks (parent flocks)

State Regulations

Said flocks shall participate in the U.S. Sanitation

Monitored Program of the National Poultry Improvement Plan set forth in
section
145.23(d)
of title 9 of the Code of Federal

Regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
57.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
